name: Super 8
description:
Made for Android VR device

As you come at your friend's apartment you don't see him but a huge mess in his room... Maybe that Camera you find there is the key to elucidate his disappearance ?

Seek and interact with the same room through 2 different temporalities in order to solve puzzles and to find a way to an answer.

Will you be able to solve the mystery fast enough ?

This game was made by Carpentier Loïc, Evrard Quentin, Lefin Théo, Agbeviade Edem and Grzegorzewski Roman
